long_description: Put away those bulky books and monster manuals! Author: Bruce Grubbs. Softcover; 87 pages; color photographs and illustrations. Morris Book Publishing, LLC.; copyright 2011. Learn how to plan and record your trip using a GPS receiver, how to edit and enhance maps and share them with others. Author offers tips on basic field techniques and conventional navigation. .
short_description: Put away those bulky books and monster manuals! Backpacker: Using a GPS distills years of knowledge into a portable guide.
